title: Project Anivia
body: I hope rito doesnt remove this for spoiling their next skin release >_> It needs to be seen though.

Quick! Tell us that they're also making Star Guardian {{champion:6}} !!!
They should release star guardian outfits for: {{champion:6}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:44}}

How dare you forget {{champion:86}} !

{{champion:86}} Sister! I am now a Star Guardian! Let us protect the universe! Justice will reign over the stars!
{{champion:99}} Ok big brother! But that outfit looks tight on you...
{{champion:86}} It is in the name of JUSTICE! Let us go sister!

When I read that, it reminded me of one specific thing, but...are you sure it's not the other way around? o.O

...unless she just killed it. :(

I have come to realize Taric can't have a star guardian skin.  It would be redundant.  If it sparkles like a star guardian, wields starlight like a star guardian, and is fabulous like a star guardian, then it is probably already a star guardian.  Or Taric is secretly Avarosa, which I like the idea of even more.
Poppy never really fit in there anyway, he can just Hyper-Kinetic-Position-Reverse her out of the picture and him into it.
I wish....
Birb.
Birb
Bird is the word

Isn't Project line meant to be fully humanoid?
Maybe Battlecast Anivia? Her E can be a missile. Not sure about the rest of her kit, though.
There's speculation about Battlecast Anivia from some or another splash art including three letters from the names of all the Battlecast champions, and then "ANV", btw.

Yes,, Project is reserved for human characters. Mecha is for Humanoids. Battlecast is majorily for monsters or animals.

And Yes, There is a very, very high chance Battlecast Anivia will happen.  They made a post a LONG time ago depicting a picture of Battlecast Cho. But also listed on it were other projects, In includeing Anivia, Kog'Maw, and Skarner. 2/3 of them have happened.

its a meme
i agree though lol
and mages shouldnt be project tbh
Then you'll never have a proper team comp with PROJECT.

You have Ekko actually.
I'm not against AP people for project skins, but rather against mages. (Syndra, Twisted Fate, etc) because they dont feel like they work with the "PROJECT " line, usually being melee stuff or guns
Perhaps, but a healthy mix of AP, AD, and tank is always good for a team.

I think Akali and Diana are both great candidates to balance out the AD/AP ratio of project skins.
Project Olaf could be a good frontline, and project Thresh and/or Braum could be another support beside Leona.
Prob won't though..She already has a hextech skin so I doubt they'll make another machine-themed skin
,,They promised us eternal life. Instead we got french fries with mayonese."
